abstract: The bookseller said that the publisher of the novels had made a deal with Amazon for exclusive e-book sales, which conflicts with a Barnes & Noble policy.
snippet: The bookseller said that the publisher of the novels had made a deal with Amazon for exclusive e-book sales, which conflicts with a Barnes & Noble policy.
lead_paragraph: In the latest salvo in publishing wars over exclusivity, Barnes & Noble said Friday that it was pulling 100 graphic novels from its shelves after the publisher of the books made a deal with Amazon to sell the digital editions exclusively.

headline.main: Barnes & Noble in Graphic Novel Dispute
